name: Group Export
description: Export all patient compartment data that are part of the specified group. More details regarding bulk export can be found [here] [http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html]. This operation is asynchronous as defined in the [FHIR Asynchronous Request Pattern](http://hl7.org/fhir/async.html)

parameter.name: _outputFormat
parameter.documentation: The format for the requested bulk data files to be generated. Supported formats - `application/fhir+ndjson`.

parameter.name: _since
parameter.documentation: Resources updated after this period will be included in the response.

parameter.name: _type
parameter.documentation: A string of comma-delimited FHIR resource types. Only resources of the specified resource types(s) will be included in the response.

parameter.name: _typeFilter
parameter.documentation: (Experimental) Search filters to refine a type search. See https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html#experimental-query-parameters for formating. This parameter is experimental and the behavior may change.
